mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rnum, C.* FROM PRODUCTS C, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)TMP ORDER BY rnum DESC limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize};

SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, P.PRODUCT_ID productID, P.PRODUCT_NAME productName, S.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierID, C.CATEGORY_NAME categoryID, P.UNIT, P.PRICE FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN SUPPLIERS S ON P.SUPPLIER_ID LIKE S.SUPPLIER_ID JOIN CATEGORIES C ON P.CATEGORY_ID LIKE C.CATEGORY_ID,(SELECT @rownum:=0) AS a WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE #{search} OR SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE #{search} OR ADDRESS LIKE #{search} OR CATEGORY_NAME LIKE #{search})R WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow};

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN SUPPLIERS S ON P.SUPPLIER_ID LIKE S.SUPPLIER_ID JOIN CATEGORIES C ON P.CATEGORY_ID LIKE C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE #{search} OR SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE #{search} OR ADDRESS LIKE #{search} OR CATEGORY_NAME LIKE #{search}
